mnd5:38.3: **Niccheyyā**ti nicchinitvā vinicchinitvā vicinitvā pavicinitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā.
mnd5:38.4: **Samuggahītan**ti odhiggāho bilaggāho varaggāho koṭṭhāsaggāho uccayaggāho samuccayaggāho, “idaṃ saccaṃ tacchaṃ tathaṃ bhūtaṃ yāthāvaṃ aviparītan”ti gahitaṃ parāmaṭṭhaṃ abhiniviṭṭhaṃ ajjhositaṃ adhimuttaṃ natthi na santi na saṃvijjati nupalabbhati, pahīnaṃ samucchinnaṃ vūpasantaṃ paṭipassaddhaṃ abhabbuppattikaṃ ñāṇagginā daḍḍhanti—

mnd5:50.13: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan”ti na paṭicchitāseti—
